activities:
L&E Meridian is a full service company who offers clients a wide variety of services specializing in:
•	Data Services (data management, online access, real-time updates, data entry, data hygiene, segmentation and coding, data conversion, storage and archiving) 
•	Digital Printing (inkjet, cut-sheet and continuous form, MICR encoding for checks and scan lines)
•	Mailing Services (intelligent inserting, 100% video camera verification, bindery, handwork for customized specialty packages and in-plant postal processing).
industrysector: Information Services - (INF)Advertising Services - (ADV)Printing & Graphic Arts Equipment - (PGA)
